This is an alternative to Vista !

Platform ---------------> Server 2008 Standard with SP1
Architecture ---------------> x64
Product Key ----------------> N/A
Activation -----------------> Activated Offline if DELL PC or manual activation with crack

Thank you for trying this modded version of Windows Server 2008 Standard Edition

Modifications :

-> Enabled windows audio
-> Optimized CPU performance for programs
-> Disabled IE Enhanced Security Configuration
-> Installed .NET Framework 3.0 and 3.5 SP1
-> Enableed SuperFetch
-> Installed desktop experience
-> Enabled themes
-> Disabled CTRL+ALT+DEL at Startup
-> Disabled shutdown event tracker
-> Enabled wireless networking
-> Enabled offline files
-> Enabled windows search service
-> UxTheme patched
-> Disabled verbose messages at startup/shutdown
-> Disabled complex password
-> Disabled password expiration
-> Installed the vista aero cursors
-> Installed the vista sidebar
-> Installed the control panel item for game controllers
-> Enableb Thumbnails instead of icons

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

On 1st logon you must choose a password :

Either you set one or just tick in the boxes and validate

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Theme :

On 1st logon the theme will be Windows Classic.

You can to change it to Windows Vista Aero.

Also added Windows 7 M3 theme and W7 wallpapers

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Windows sidebar :

Run Sidebar_Patch in TOOLBOX folder on hardrive root

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All updates to February 21st 2009 were installed

Following Drivers Packs were added : Graphics, LAN, WLAN, et Masstorage

Directx9c_Nov2008 Installed

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

On the OEM PC's the release is activated !

For non OEM :

From C: -> TOOLBOX -> WIN2K8ACTIVATION :

-> Run ACTIVATION.EXE and follow the instrcutions !

Answer YES when asked to stop SOFTWARE LICENCING SERVICE !

Computer will restart and be activated.

Server functionnalities are fully operational !

Correct updates for Windows Server 2008 Standard Edition are possible !
